children.value: Site's built with the Carbon Gatsby theme starter come ready to go with some helpful npm scripts. You can run these commands by typing
- this is used to clean gatsby's cache and public directory. It should be used sparingly, only when you're experiencing weird errors or caching issues.

- this is what you'll use to bundle your site. Gatsby will minimize your images and create a static, blazing fast site in your
- this can be run to serve the bundle locally after running
